purpose: To provide a platform for creating and managing autonomous AI agents with ease.
principle: Built on modern web technologies, leveraging AI models like GPT for autonomous agent behavior.
reusability: Offers a web-based interface for creating agents and supports integrations with AI models via APIs.
limitations: Limited to browser-based deployment; relies on external AI models for advanced capabilities.
